column2: "We're ready to start ordering you around. First up, I've got an order for you."

"I want to send you after some tentacled enemies...
Can you defeat a Biol Meduna?"
"I thought there were no enemies with tentacles at all, but I'd forgotten about her."
"This is my Partner Card. Call me for the quest, if you like! I'll be happy to help you any time."
"Oh, yes, if possible, touch those tentacles with your bare hands and tell me how they feel. Thanks in advance!"
